area_name: Brain Boulder A.K.A. The Warm Up Area, The

climbs.name: V2 + Traverse left of the brain.

content.description: Start on the left side of this low-ball an work over on this good warm-up. Use the interesting dishes and slopers to gain the easy topout way over right.
content.protection: Pad, someone to move it to the top-out

content.description: Start way over on the right on jugs, start traversing left, round the corner, power on little edges heel hooking and crimping then past the pump crux on big move trying to keep you ass off the ground. Finish the route in the obvious crack up V2 moves that requires concentration.
content.protection: Pad, and a spotter to move the pad.

pathTokens: Brain Boulder A.K.A. The Warm Up Area, The

content.description:
A big vertical limestone boulder with more holds than you can shake a stick at. Cracks in between the boulder were made by acid eons ago and they are deep and hide jugs for a nice easy top out up and left. 

  The landing zone is flat and soft so a pad is rarely used here during warm-ups, in fact most folks don't even put on climbing shoes because the feet are so huge.
